page.title: 19THE GRAVEL PITS
page.content: Steetly Gravel Company is the main industry of the area,and is gradually expanding into the south-east of the region.Gravel is being dug out from the flood-plain of the riverTrent.Land is bought under a compulsory purchase order,and after the gravel has been removed the land must be restored to its former state.Some of this restored land is now reverting to grazing land The "DRAG-LINE"(the line of digging)is coming very near to the village of Barrow. Lorries take the gravel many miles away from the area.
